import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-employeecrud', templateUrl: './employeecrud.component.html', styleUrls: ['./employeecrud.component.scss'] }) export class EmployeecrudComponent { name : string ="" address : string ="" phone: string = "" constructor(private http: HttpClient) { } register() { let bodyData = { "name": this.name, "address": this.address, "phone": this.phone }; this.http.post("htt" } }
